title: Slaughter at speed
brief_description: Shows some attempts to find solutions to the problem of death on the roads. The slaughter in cars, buses, trucks and other vehicles which move on the roads follow an hourly predictable pattern. Discusses American and British research in discovering what happens when a car crashes and how best to keep the people inside it alive - or to prevent the crash ever occurring.
